headline: Why PureCycle Technologies (PCT) Is Down 9.0% After Record Resin Output and EU Grant Progress – And What’s Next
summary: PureCycle Technologies recently reported record production of 7.2 million pounds of PureFive resin at its Ironton facility during the third quarter of 2025, while also advancing to the negotiation phase for a €40 million EU Innovation Fund grant to support its European project. The company expects to further expand output and begin shipments to major customers like Procter & Gamble and a top-five global quick service restaurant in the coming months, signaling tangible progress in...
